title: Episode 123 (video): What Does Your Dog Know About You?
description: What do your dog and Shakespeare have in common?  Well, they both use a Theory of Mind.  Join me for this video episode in which I look at this fascinating idea of theory of mind and the unique and fun research that has been done around it.  And yes, you might pick up an idea of how to test your dog to see if your dog can actually read your mind.
